title: How to Defeat Octoroks in the Legend of Zelda

steps.headline: Ready your shield.
steps.description: Octoroks can sometimes lie in plain sight or hide behind bushes and pop out of the water- that’s why having your shield ready at all times is a good measure. Equip your shield on one of your controller’s Action button as you walk along watery or bushy parts of the map so you can easily take it out under short notice.

steps.headline: Block Octoroks’ projectiles.
steps.description: Once you come within a few feet of the monster, it will immediately start shooting rocks at you. Using your shield, cover yourself and deflect the enemy’s projectile attacks.

steps.headline: Slowly walk towards the Octorok.
steps.description: While covering yourself with your shield, slowly step towards the monster. Once it’s within the range of your sword, quickly press the Action button where your offensive weapon is equipped to take a blow or shot at the monster. Octoroks have very low life points and can easily be killed with just one or two blows of your sword.

methods.name: Defeating Octoroks Using Bow and Arrows

steps.headline: Have your bow and arrow ready.
steps.description: Once you see an Octorok, find a safe spot a great distance away from where the monster is.

steps.headline: Dodge Octoroks’ projectiles.
steps.description: If you come within a few feet of the monster, it will immediately start shooting rocks at you. Your distance from the monster though should give ample time to react and sidestep out of the trajectory of the Octorok’s projectiles.

steps.headline: Shoot the Octorok.
steps.description: Press and hold the Action button where you currently have the bow and arrow equipped. Adjust your aim using the control keys on your controller, and release the Action button to shoot the monster. It takes only one or two arrows to defeat an Octorok.

steps.headline: Have your bombs ready.
steps.description: Once you see an Octorok, press the Action button on your controller where the bomb is equipped to take out a bomb.

steps.headline: Adjust your aim.
steps.description: If the Octorok you found is stationary, then there’s no need to adjust your aim. But if it’s walking around, you have anticipate its course of direction so you can throw the bomb exactly where the monster will go.

steps.headline: Throw the bomb.
steps.description: Press the Action button again to throw one directly at the Octorok. Wait for a few seconds until the bomb goes off near the monster, killing it.
